note.p: Career: Apprenticed to an apothecary, London (1769) but returned home (1771); through his uncle Richard Price's influence he became Assistant Actuary (1774) and Actuary to the Equitable Assurance Society (1775-1830)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1832-1833 No 14 pp 226-227
References: J D Holland, 'An Eighteenth-Century Pioneer - Richard Price, DD, FRS (1723-1791)' in NR 1968 vol 23 pp 43-64
